clearcontrol.microscope.adaptive

Interface AdaptiveEngineInterface<S extends AcquisitionStateInterface<?,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - state type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveEngine

    public interface AdaptiveEngineInterface<S extends AcquisitionStateInterface<?,?>>
    Interface implemented by all adaptive engines
    Author:
    royer
